meanings.definition: Marked by a dent or dents.
meanings.sent1: The dented car had a dent on its side.
meanings.sent2: The old, dented pot sat on the kitchen shelf.
meanings.sent3: The dented toy bear looked like it had been in a playful wrestling match.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence was dented after receiving harsh criticism.
meanings.sent5: The dented shield showed the warrior's battles and victories.

meanings.definition: To have made a dent or dents in something.
meanings.sent1: He dented the can when he dropped it on the floor.
meanings.sent2: The hailstorm dented the roof of the house.
meanings.sent3: She playfully dented the clay with her fingers, creating a unique sculpture.
meanings.sent4: The news dented his hopes of winning the competition.
meanings.sent5: The hammer dented the metal with each strike, shaping it into a beautiful sculpture.
